docs.title: LSL.Disposables.EnvironmentVariables
docs.text: A simple library to allow for disposable environment variables. It provides a scope for a set of environment variables and ensures that the state of the environment variables is restored after the scope has been disposed.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
using LSL.Disposables.EnvironmentVariables;

...

using var disposableEnvironmentVars = new DisposableEnvironmentVariables();

Environment.SetVariable("test", "value");

// test is only available in this scope
// Any added variables will be removed once the
// scope has been exited (disposableEnvironmentVars has been disposed)
